text: The internet was shocked when Halsey announced her separation from G - Eazy this week. In a social media post, Halsey wrote, ` ` I normally keep this kind of thing private but provided our public. nature I feel the need to inform my fans. G - Eazy and I are taking some time apart.'' She continued on to say, ` ` I'm eager to continue the upcoming passage of time dedicating myself to my art and my career, and the duration of my tour. I wish him the best. Thanks for respecting our privacy at this time.'' Now, it appears as if Halsey may have her eyes on another tall wild boy, Machine Gun Kelly. According to TMZ, the Halsey / G - Eazy break up was anticipated by friends close
